title: (x) "Commercial Sex in Japan" simple tech sans - Typ1451 {Conor}
content:
No idea what this is, but I love the lowercase A. Anybody else have an idea?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

 [‹ Futura-like Andalucía](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194054/http:/typophile.com/node/35652 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fashion typography (similar to ITC Avant Garde Gothic) - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alt {Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194054/http:/typophile.com/node/35642 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content:
Looks like Din17 to me. But I think the “r” is different. It also reminds me of a font which I believe is called Simpliciter Sans, but as I recall Simpliciter is more condensed.

EDIT: While I was editing my post, Conor nailed it, as usual! He’s a star.
